title: The New Women of Wonder
description: This anthology contains:Introduction (1977) by Pamela SargentView From The Moon Station (1977) by Sonya DormanScrewtop (1976) by Vonda N. McIntyreThe Warlord of Saturn's Moons (1974) by Eleanor ArnasonThe Triumphant Head (1970) by Josephine SaxtonThe Heat Death of The Universe (1967) by Pamela ZolineSongs of War (1974) by Kit ReedThe Women Men Don't See (1973) by James Tiptree Jr.Debut (1970) by Carol EmshwillerWhen It Changed (1972) by Joanna RussDead In Irons (1976) by Chelsea Quinn YarbroBuilding Block (1975) by Sonya DormanEyes of Amber (1976) by Joan D. VingeFurther Reading (1977), uncreditedWhen It Changed by Joanna Russ won the Nebula Award for best short story in 1972.Eyes of Amber by Joan D. Vinge won the Hugo Award for best novelette in 1978.
author: Pamela Sargent
